Question: Cynix Systems Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Cynix Systems Inc

DreameBot X30 Ultra smart vacuum

- New add-on blade attachment to prevent tangles
- Auto-empty docking station with self-cleaning feature
- Innovative vacuum technology to solve common pain points
